version_description:
*Chú ý: Cập nhật lên iOS phiên bản mới nhất để trải nghiệm Laban Key tốt nhất.


***** Cải tiến mới *****
- Tương thích với iOS 8.3, không còn hiện tượng bàn phím bị treo
- Lỗi nhảy dòng trong app Danh Bạ, lỗi không đánh được trong mục revi

*Chú ý: Hãy cập nhật lên iOS phiên bản mới nhất để trải nghiệm Laban Key tốt nhất.

**** Cải tiến mới ****
- Hỗ trợ thêm nhiều loại keyboard như URL, Email, Twitter ... như bàn phím mặc định
- Thêm popup hiển thị kí tự từ các nút nguyên âm (

- Thêm các tuỳ chọn cho bàn phím
- Sửa lỗi về tự động viết hoa và gợi ý từ

* Update with a smarter and more accurate suggestion engine:
- Compound word suggestion.
- Shortcut suggestion.
- Word learning (You can turn this feature OFF).
* Improve keyboard load time and stability.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Add nice effects in custom themes
- Auto correction
- Guide to fix iOS's "null" error
- Minor bug fixes

- Add beautiful effects to custom themes.
- Smart auto-correction.
- Guide to fix iOS's "null" error.
- Minor bug fixes.

Introduce Laban Theme store
- Easily download many beautiful themes.
- Create and share your custom theme to Laban community.
- Thousands of community themes updated.

Introduce new features:
- Backup and restore your data easily.
- Update new user interface
- Improve auto-correction
- Minor bug fixes and improvement
- Fix a bug that causes keyboard to crash on load.
Sửa lỗi

New feature:
- Search theme from store and community
- Support iOS 11

- Fix some minor bugs and improve performance
Fix bug for iOS 13

- Support one-hand mode for large screen devices (not iPad)
- Emoji suggestion is better now
- Make keyboard stable

- Add new Kaomoji keyboard & Symbol keyboard
- Several performance and UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- Fix keyboard display bug
- Easier access to Zavatar sticker

- Improve emoji suggestion
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Suggest stickers while typing.
- Fix a bug that crash keyboard

- Change keyboard user interface
- Smarter word learning
- Bug fixes and performance improvement
- Fix some sticker display issues.

- Support for iPhone X.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Fix a bug that returns to default keyboard.
- Fix a display bug on iOS 12.

- Add support for iPhone XS Max
- Capitalized word suggestions
- Word suggestions for the beginning of sentences
- Improved auto correction

- Fix a bug that crash keyboard
- Fix auto-correction bug when word suggestion is off
- Bug fixes and performance improvement.
- Bug fixes and performance improvement.
Sửa lỗi
- Fix a small bug in emoji keyboard
- Fix some sticker display issues.

- Change keyboard user interface
- Smarter word learning
- Bug fixes and performance improvement

- Fix keyboard display bug
- Easier access to Zavatar sticker
- Suggest stickers while typing.

- Improve emoji suggestion
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Enhance word suggestion
- Support correction on compound words
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Fix a bug that crash keyboard

- Pasting saved notes on keyboard.
- General bug fixes.

- Support one-hand mode for large screen devices (not iPad)
- Emoji suggestion is better now
- Make keyboard stable

- Support one-hand mode for large screen devices (not iPad)
- Emoji suggestion is better now
- Make keyboard stable

- Add new Kaomoji keyboard & Symbol keyboard
- Several performance and UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- Show statistics using keyboard
- Support ios 13
- Fixbug and optimization
Fix bug for iOS 13

- Change effect for move Cursor feature
- Add brand Laban Key
- Modify keyClick's sound
- Fix minor bugs and improve performance

- Improve move Cursor feature
- Add Sign-in with Apple
- Enhance suggestion
- Change UI of ios theme
- Fixbug and optimization
- Fixbug and improve performance

- Haptic feedback on key press
- Fix bugs and improve performance

- Add home screen quick action for useful feature
- Learning & suggestion hashtag
- Improve shortcut feature
- Fix bugs & improve performance

- Add home screen quick action for useful feature
- Learning & suggestion hashtag
- Improve shortcut feature
- Fix bugs & improve performance
Fixbug and Improve performance

- Add feature key correction realtime
- Improve user's history
- Fix some minor bug
Fix bug crash on iOS 14

New layout for landscape keyboard
Add new emoji for iOS 14.2
Fix bugs and improve performance

New layout for landscape keyboard
Add new emoji for iOS 14.2
Fix bugs and improve performance

New layout for landscape keyboard
Add new emoji for iOS 14.2
Fix bugs and improve performance

- Thêm cài đặt bật/tắt phím bổ sung cho bàn phím nằm ngang
- Cải thiện UI giúp người dùng nhận biết tốt hơn trạng thái của bàn phím
- Giúp người dùng sử dụng emoji dễ dàng hơn
- Sửa một số lỗi nhỏ

- Mở tính năng chọn câu chúc tết 2021
- Sửa lỗi và cải tiến hiệu năng
